title: Macworld Podcast: Airing of grievances
content:
Macworld

As much as we enjoy and depend on Apple and its products, there are a few things we wish Apple would fix or change. On this episode of the Macworld Podcast, we’re having an airing of grievances—what are some things we wish Apple would pay attention to? Tune in and find out!

This is episode 895 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.
